attributes.action: tax the sale of cannabis to end the credit crunch
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We propose that by creating an industry around cannabis the government can tax the sale of cannabis raising billions in taxation aswell as creating 10`s of thousands of jobs in the process.

Medicinal marijuana would help ease the cost of many specific medical conditions.

Lastly I can grow a simple herb without fear of being criminalized when I am not a criminal.
